channel.title: Omicron on The Swedish Pathogens Portal
channel.description: Recent content in Omicron on The Swedish Pathogens Portal

item.title: Direct RT-PCR used to monitor Omicron BA.1/BA.2 variant transition in Sweden (Update)
item.description: Lentini and collegues used direct RT-PCR to show the transition from Omicron BA.1 to sub-variant BA.2 in Sweden Jan-March 2022. New Preprint from Reinius lab which shares data and code.
